div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the e-Prescribing route of administration. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS e-Prescribing route of administration subset' with subset original id 30201000001137; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset FSN is 'ePrescribing route of administration simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000051000001100.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = ^999000051000001100 |ePrescribing route of administration simple reference set|
